name: Tomorrow May Come
description:
Most social institutions have collapsed or been reduced to isolated megacities, scattered around the globe. Lead four inhabitants of the wasteland that used to be Japan as you gather resources and fight for survival in an attempt to repay an insurmountable debt in this isometric-tactical-rpg.

EARLY ALPHA:

Note that TMC currently is in very early Alpha and that this build mostly consists of different prototypes put together. Everything is subject to change, and all feedback is appreciated!

Have any questions or would like to be notified of updates or playtest future prototypes? Send us a mail at foreigntundra@zohomail.eu!

To be added to the mailing list for future updates: Send something along the lines of "Hi! I would like to be notified whenever a new version of Tomorrow May Come is released on itch.io!"

To be added to the mailing list for playtesting future prototypes: Send something along the lines of "Hi! I would like to be notified whenever you are looking for people to playtest prototype versions of Tomorrow May Come!"
